functions.name: DropdownMenu
functions.description: Re-export of Radix DropdownMenu root primitive for composition.

functions.name: DropdownMenuTrigger
functions.description: Re-export of the trigger primitive used to open the dropdown.

functions.name: DropdownMenuContent
functions.description: Styled wrapper around Radix DropdownMenu.Content placed into a Portal. Applies consistent styling, animations and a default sideOffset.

functions.name: DropdownMenuItem
functions.description: Styled wrapper around Radix DropdownMenu.Item supporting an `inset` prop for aligned content and centralizing common item classes.

functions.name: DropdownMenuSubTrigger / DropdownMenuSubContent
functions.signature: const DropdownMenuSubTrigger = React.forwardRef(...); const DropdownMenuSubContent = React.forwardRef(...)
functions.description: Helpers for nested submenus: SubTrigger renders an item with a trailing ChevronRight; SubContent renders a SubContent portal-styled panel.

functions.name: DropdownMenuCheckboxItem / DropdownMenuRadioItem
functions.signature: const DropdownMenuCheckboxItem = React.forwardRef(...); const DropdownMenuRadioItem = React.forwardRef(...)
functions.description: Checkbox and radio menu item wrappers that include item indicators (Check / Circle icons) and consistent padding/styling.

functions.name: DropdownMenuLabel / DropdownMenuSeparator / DropdownMenuShortcut
functions.signature: const DropdownMenuLabel = React.forwardRef(...); const DropdownMenuSeparator = React.forwardRef(...); const DropdownMenuShortcut = (...) => JSX.Element
functions.description: Small presentational helpers for menu labels, separators and shortcut text.

notes: This module centralizes Radix DropdownMenu primitives and applies the app's design system classes (via `cn`). It provides many convenience re-exports for building menus consistently across the app.
